## isLineAccessor() function

Helper function to check if an accessor is of type `ILineAccessor`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isLineAccessor(arg: any): arg is ILineAccessor;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arg | any | <code>true</code> if <code>arg</code> is <code>ILineAccessor</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

arg is [ILineAccessor](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.md)
